moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Block
moves.description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
